alert.note: Alert for Benton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 12:47PM CDT until further notice by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by runoff from excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Missouri, including the following county, Benton. * WHEN...Until 200 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1245 PM CDT, gauge reports indicated that between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Williams Creek at Highway B. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lincoln, Cole Camp, Mora, Brandon and Crockerville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
